task-107.title: Fix ZIP upload - only last file stored (bug)
task-107.description: When uploading ZIP files with >2 files, only the last file gets stored. All files are extracted but only the last one persists. Next.js apps return 404.
task-107.bug: ZIP upload reports all files extracted but only last file saved to LMDB
task-107.rootCause: LMDB writes in Node.js are ASYNC (return Promise). AppFilesStore.save() is called synchronously in a loop without await, so only last write persists.

steps.title: Fix: Add await to LMDB writes in ZIP upload loop
Test fix with multi-file ZIP uploads
Deploy fix and verify Next.js apps work
